main.name: Bhushan Pawara
main.bio: Bhushan Bhayla Pawara is currently pursuing a Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in Computer Science and Engineering from the National Institute of Technology, Manipur, with an expected graduation in June 2025. He has a strong academic background, having completed his Higher Secondary Certificate (HSC) in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics with a commendable grade of 87.8% from Vagad Pace Global School in Virar. Bhushan has gained practical experience as a Full-Stack Developer during a month-long internship at Bharat Intern, where he worked on building authentication and social media applications using technologies like Node.js, React.js, MongoDB, Express.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In addition to his internship, Bhushan has undertaken several projects, including 'SHOPPER,' a web application that enables users to register, login, and logout using their name, email, and password. His technical skills encompass a variety of programming languages and tools, including C/C++, JavaScript, SQL, React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, MySQL, Git, GitHub, Postman, and Visual Studio Code. He is also well-versed in computer science fundamentals such as Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA), Compiler Design, Computer Networks, Operating Systems, and Database Management Systems (DBMS). Bhushan's dedication to enhancing his coding skills is evident from his achievements on competitive programming platforms, where he has solved over 250 questions on LeetCode and GeeksforGeeks (GFG).

work.title: Internship
work.description: Made 2 Projects. Authentication and social media app.
